attributes.title: THIS APP RUINED MY LIFE
attributes.review: Buffalo protester shoved by Police could be an ANTIFA provocateur. 75 year old Martin Gugino was pushed away after appearing to scan police communications in order to black out the equipment. @OANN  I watched, he fell harder than was pushed. Was aiming scanner. Could be a set up?

attributes.title: Terrifying Cheeto Monster
attributes.review: So I’m sitting here, barbecue sauce on my Cheetos, and I downloaded this seemingly fun app because it said Trump and I’m brainwashed to think that he actually cares about anyone but himself, and he isn’t the third world leader to gas their citizens, and that he totally didn’t rape countless children even though its on file, and in the 60’s he most positively didn’t mark black people’s applications to his NYC apartments as a “C” for colored, but anyways... I opened the app and there was this terrifying Cheeto monster staring at the ceiling or something and then it asked for my phone number so they could spam me and sell my info. Idk about you but now I have nightmares of that thing.

attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: When I first found out trump was running for office I didn’t think much of it, and then he became president! A real life cheeto as our president! I mean what could be better? I was SO excited when he started to pull America out of the Paris agreement, as an environmentalist I found great joy in this decision. I think the next time Donnie made me proud was when we found out about Epstein and all the little fun they had together 🥰🥰🥰✨✨✨✨ I truly cannot think of a better annoying orange to run this country! he wants to make America a dictatorship where only whites live?!?! Omg it’s like a reincarnation of H*tler. Anywayyyy I love u Donnie ♥️ I have a little impeach sticker on my laptop that looks identical to your obese a** ✨✨✨✨✨ every morning it brings me joy knowing that there are people that hate you more than I hate you tehheeee okay bye crusty 😘

attributes.title: this app gave me IBS
attributes.review: i thought this app was meant to get real news on trump, but turns out it just gave me extreme diarrhea!!! and i mean EXTREME! i was running to the bathroom right after opening the app.  i was sick all day until i decided to delete this app. ive never been riddled with so much poop in my life- all thanks to poopy trump. i bet he wanted this-well who’s laughing now!

attributes.title: The software is buggy
attributes.review:
Upon downloading, I got an overwhelming urge to refer to anyone with morals as “snowflakes”, harass women, racially profile people, blame things on China, and golf. Being apart of his culture for so long, those things didn’t bother me, it were the things after that had me concerned.

One feature that I didn’t like is it blocked all news outlets on my phone and labeled it as “fake”. I also don’t like how it simultaneously downloaded PornHub onto my phone without my permission. I know that they have a paid partnership but it was still unnecessary.

I don’t know if this is a coincidence or not, but every time I use the bathroom, I get a notification from the app requesting to access the camera. Please fix this bug. The first time I tried reporting it, the words CODE KATIE popped up on the screen offering me a large settlement to not report it. 

I got this app thinking I was going to better my bootlicking skills but instead it was him taking about how great the app was saying “it’s the best on the market, ask anybody” and then asking for donations while bragging that this whole campaign is “out of pocket”. I believe every word of it because Donald has never lied to us before... I just want it to be fixed so I can wank again:(

attributes.title: My eyes😭😢🍤
attributes.review: I saw this app and I was like 😱my lord got an app I was so excited but when I opend the app a picture of Mr.Trumps pp showed when I saw it I was like where are the 🥜it looked like a 🍤that is why I gave it a 1😢I’m blind now😭😭😭

attributes.title: I'm DISGUSTED Trump is a pedophile👁👄👁
attributes.review: i downloaded the app, and the next thing i know, i'm bombarded with emails asking me, a MINOR, if i think donald trump is sexy... 😔👀😔 disgusting. as if i would ever think that little BUNKER BABY is a hottie. 🤢🤢🤢
